LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Batch_Chain__c.description: Identifies processes that are running in one process chain.

cgcloud__Batch_ID__c.description: Identifier of the batch process instance.

cgcloud__Duration_Time__c.description: Run time of the batch process in milliseconds.

cgcloud__End_Date__c.description: End date and time of the batch process.

cgcloud__Items_Done__c.description: Number of job items that were successfully processed.

cgcloud__Items_Error__c.description: Number of job items that were processed with an error.

cgcloud__Items_Scheduled__c.description: Number of job items that were scheduled for a job.

cgcloud__Job_Name__c.description: Job Name under which the process is scheduled.

cgcloud__Last_Update_Date__c.description: Last update date and time of the batch process.

cgcloud__Process_Count__c.description: Count of process instances that were involved in the job processing.

cgcloud__Progress_Current_Value__c.description: Last progress update of the batch process.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: SalesOrg context on which the batch process is running.

cgcloud__Start_Date__c.description: Start date and time of the batch process.

cgcloud__Transaction_ID__c.description: Log transaction ID that's assigned to the batch process.
